message.body: Hey #### - sorry to bug you, but can I get the details on exactly where and when tomorrow's meeting is?
No worries! Its at 630 at########'s at #### and ######. I'll get the exact address for you.
Okay, great. I should be able to make that no problem. Thanks!
Sure! I'm glad you can make it!
Okay, thank you. See you tomorrow
